casebody.data:
IN RE LUIS N., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2017 Albert J. Oneto IV, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Frank H. LaMonaca, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent father for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 307 , 167 A.3d 476 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
